statements: SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM health_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE health_condition='Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM health_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, health_condition FROM health_records ORDER BY health_condition DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM health_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_records > 2 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM health_records WHERE health_condition LIKE '%Cancer%' AND YEAR(date_of_birth) > 1980 ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM health_records WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth) >= 3650 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT test_name, result FROM MedicalTests WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalTests WHERE result = 'Positive' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, result FROM PatientRecords JOIN MedicalTests ON PatientRecords.patient_id = MedicalTests.patient_id WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM MedicalTests WHERE result = 'Negative');
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, address FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_id, date, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT result_id, test_name, value, unit FROM LabResults WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT Patients.name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, LabResults.test_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON MedicalRecords.record_id = LabResults.record_id;

SELECT Patients.name, MedicalRecords.date, LabResults.value, LabResults.unit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON MedicalRecords.record_id = LabResults.record_id WHERE LabResults.test_name='Blood Pressure';

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.address, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, LabResults.test_name, LabResults.value, LabResults.unit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON MedicalRecords.record_id = LabResults.record_id WHERE MedicalRecords.date>'2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescribing_doctor FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, health_condition FROM Visits WHERE health_condition LIKE '%flu%' AND visit_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, prescribing_doctor FROM Medications WHERE dosage > '100mg' ORDER BY prescribing_doctor ASC;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM LabResults JOIN Visits ON LabResults.visit_id = Visits.visit_id WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, result_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN Visits ON Patients.patient_id = Visits.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male' AND Medications.dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY Patients.contact_number ASC, Medications.medication_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage >= 100 ORDER BY medication_name;
